resources.string: Here you can view water levels along a river. Possible actions are
Timestamps: view water levels at different times. Only available when monitoring is enabled in settings, and after run for a while.
Normalize: display water levels in relation to their average max (MHW, 1007) and average min values (MNW, 07).
Map: show the measuring stations for this river on a map.
Series: select which lines to display on the graph.
